Html:
Thank you for developing this interface and all of the work that you have put in.  I have been using the original version V1 wrapper for several years now with great success. 

I am now in the process of install this version into my system and I have run into a performance issue while trying to access V1 task schedule.  My process takes a list or task and then looks them up in the scheduler to get the current status.  At present some of the servers have 200+ tasks in the sechedule and doing a lookup take 1+ seconds per query.   It appears that this is caused by scanning the entire task list for the name requested.  I am not experencing the same performance issues with the original version. 

Until I get the V1 options working I am not able to test the V2 actions.

Do you have any recommendations on how to speed up the task lookup action?

In source code version 65722 I have optimized a couple of routines that may speed up your access. Please try and let me know. If not, please post the code you are using to do the task lookup so I can see which methods are being called.

ï»¿
